sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Thy loyal health occasion'd by His Majesties most happy deliverance from the late horrid phanatical conspiracy by the fire at Newmarket. W. R.
[4] p.
Printed for Charles Corbet ..., London : 1684.
Imprint information from colophon. "By the author of Ferguson's remonstrance" p. 4. Caption title. With 6 lines of music. Also includes "Loyalty triumphant" with 2 lines of music. Begins: Ye monarchy hater, / And Whiggs of that leven. Not to be confused with "The loyal health: a court song, which begins: Since plotting's a trade. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
Thy loyal health occasion'd by His Majesties most happy deliverance from the late horrid phanatical conspiracy by the fire at Newmarket. W. R.
[4] p.
Printed for Charles Corbet ..., London : 1684.
Imprint information from colophon. "By the author of Ferguson's remonstrance" p. 4. Caption title. With 6 lines of music. Also includes "Loyalty triumphant" with 2 lines of music. Begins: Ye monarchy hater, / And Whiggs of that leven. Not to be confused with "The loyal health: a court song, which begins: Since plotting's a trade. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Charles Corbet
